0;gap:1.5rem}.pagination{background-color:#000;grid-column:1/-1;grid-row:3/4}}@media (max-width:750px){.main-header{flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.main-header h1{margin:0}.main-header form{width:100%}.main-header form input{width:80%;margin:0 auto}.main-header form button{background-color:red;margin-left:-12rem;margin-right:10%;display:none}.card__img-container img{height:37rem}.main-wraper{padding:0}.main-content{grid-template-columns:80%}.main-footer__heading-primary:after,.main-footer__heading-primary:before,.main-footer__item:before{display:none}}@media (max-width:450px){.main-content{grid-template-columns:92%}.main-footer__heading-secundary{text-align:center}.pagination{flex-direction:column}.pagination a{width:60%}.pagination a:first-child{margin-top:2rem}.pagination a:last-child{margin-bottom:3rem}}@media (max-width:377px){.main-header h1{text-align:center;line-height:1.2}.card__img-container img{height:26rem;transform:translateY(0)}}
